snippet: Now it can be revealed: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. plays a cameo role on “Parks and Recreation” on Nov. 15.
abstract: Scene from upcoming season of NBC sitcom Parks and Recreation in which Vice Pres Joe Biden makes a cameo appearance can finally be revealed now that the presidential election is over.
lead_paragraph: Now it can be revealed: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. plays a cameo role on “Parks and Recreation” on Nov. 15.

headline.seo: Joe Biden to Appear on ‘Parks and Recreation’
headline.main: No Method Acting: On Sitcom, Biden Plays Biden
headline.print_headline: No Method Acting: On Sitcom, Biden Plays Biden
